wiki.summary: "Addicted to You" is a song by the Swedish DJ and producer Avicii, featuring vocals from the American singer Audra Mae. The track was released as a single in 2014 and is part of Avicii's debut studio album, "True." Known for his signature style of electronic dance music, Avicii combines elements of house, pop, and folk in "Addicted to You." The song features a catchy melody, infectious beats, and Mae's soulful vocals, creating an energetic and uplifting atmosphere. Read more on Last.fm.
wiki.content: "Addicted to You" is a song by the Swedish DJ and producer Avicii, featuring vocals from the American singer Audra Mae. The track was released as a single in 2014 and is part of Avicii's debut studio album, "True." Known for his signature style of electronic dance music, Avicii combines elements of house, pop, and folk in "Addicted to You." The song features a catchy melody, infectious beats, and Mae's soulful vocals, creating an energetic and uplifting atmosphere. Lyrically, "Addicted to You" explores the theme of a passionate and addictive love affair. The song's lyrics touch upon the intense emotions and overwhelming desire associated with being consumed by a romantic relationship. The combination of Mae's powerful vocals and Avicii's skillful production enhances the emotional impact of the song, making it resonate with listeners. Upon its release, "Addicted to You" achieved commercial success, reaching high chart positions in several countries around the world. The song's infectious energy and catchy chorus contributed to its popularity and solidified Avicii's reputation as a leading figure in the electronic dance music scene. Read more on Last.fm.
